variable.label: Vstart
variable.tooltip: QSI uses this only if speed tables are used

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F1
variable.tooltip: F1 = Bell; Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = OFF, End = OFF

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F2
variable.tooltip: F2 = Horn / Whistle; Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = OFF, End = OFF

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F3
variable.tooltip: F3 = Coupler Clash (default); Recommendation: Lead = OFF, Mid = OFF, End = ON

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F4
variable.tooltip: F4 = Blower Hiss / Fan (default); Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = ON, End = ON

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F5
variable.tooltip: F5 = Dynamic Brakes (default); Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = ON, End = ON

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F6
variable.tooltip: F6 = Doppler (Startup) (default); Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = ON, End = ON

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F7
variable.tooltip: F7 = Brake Squeal and Air Brakes (default); Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = ON, End = ON

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F8
variable.tooltip: F8 = Audio Mute (default); Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = ON, End = ON

variable.label: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
variable.tooltip: FL(f) = Directional Lighting; Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = OFF, End = OFF

variable.label: Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse
variable.tooltip: FL(r) = Directional Lighting; Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = OFF, End = OFF

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F9
variable.tooltip: F9 = Cruise Ctrl (Shut Down) (default); Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = ON, End = ON

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F10
variable.tooltip: F10 = SMPH Report (Status Report) (default); Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = OFF, End = OFF

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F11
variable.tooltip: F11 = Number Board Lights (default); Recommendation: Lead = ON, Mid = ON, End = ON

variable.label: Consist Address Active For F12
variable.tooltip: F12 = Cab Lights (default); Recommendation: Lead = OFF, Mid = OFF, End = OFF

variable.label: Acceleration Adjustment
variable.tooltip: This is used whenever acceleration is non zero

variable.label: Deceleration Adjustment
variable.tooltip: This is used whenever deceleration is non zero

enumChoice.choice: Use QSI table or User table in CVs 67 through 94
